main

Class Emulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Emulator

  • public class Emulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arno This is the Emulator. It automatically gets all data on it's own from other classes and Objects. Logs what is doing.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MapGraph graph 
      static BiMap<java.lang.Integer,BiMap.MyEntry<java.lang.Integer>> mapping
      This Map is structured as follows: (K,(V,V',V'')) we can easily Map K <-> (V,V',V'') Therefore it should store: Index of matrix-vector (column) <-> (NodeID,NodeTarget,progress) where NodeTarget,progress == 0,0 for "real" nodes
      static Matrix matrix 
      private static java.util.ArrayList<Emulateable> mods 
      static java.lang.Long[] timeStamps 
      private static WeightingFunction weightingFunction

      • mapping

        public static BiMap<java.lang.Integer,BiMap.MyEntry<java.lang.Integer>> mapping
        This Map is structured as follows: (K,(V,V',V'')) we can easily Map K <-> (V,V',V'') Therefore it should store: Index of matrix-vector (column) <-> (NodeID,NodeTarget,progress) where NodeTarget,progress == 0,0 for "real" nodes
